description:
The Mecha-Ude user Aki Murasame transfers into Hikaru`s class with the intention to secure Alma. She belongs to an organization named ARMS and she starts following Hikaru and Alma around 24/7 and Hikaru seems completely exhausted because of all of this.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: We Live in Completely Different Worlds
生きてる世界が違いすぎ
